summary: This document is an invoice from J Epstein & Co Inc detailing transportation charges for FedEx services. It includes various shipments made between July 12 and August 1, 2000, with specific charges and recipients listed. The invoice highlights the financial transactions related to shipping services utilized by Epstein's company.

keyFacts: The invoice details transportation charges totaling $540.21 for various shipments.
Multiple individuals are listed as recipients for packages sent from J Epstein & Co Inc.
Antoinette Ghislaine Maxwell is frequently mentioned as a sender in the document.
The document includes specific dates for package pickups and deliveries.
There are references to temporary fuel surcharges applied to the transportation charges.
